lessons.japanese: 何もこぼさなければ私のスカーフをしてもいいわよ。
lessons.indonesian: You can wear my scarf as long as you don't spill anything on it.

lessons.japanese: ベスはスカーフを破いたと言って妹のサリーを責めました。
lessons.indonesian: Beth accused her sister, Sally, of tearing her scarf.

lessons.japanese: その少女は首に長いスカーフを巻いていた。
lessons.indonesian: The girl had a long scarf around her neck.

lessons.japanese: その女の子は首のまわりにスカーフを巻いている。
lessons.indonesian: The girl has a scarf around her neck.

lessons.japanese: このスカーフはすべすべする。
頭をスカーフで包みなさい。
lessons.indonesian: Wrap your head in a scarf.

lessons.japanese: 何もこぼさなければ私のスカーフをしてもいいわよ。
lessons.indonesian: You can wear my scarf as long as you don't spill anything on it.
